analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/15/0x280b12a70b48dcccfc263d6ef62e311b50169bdd.sol#224-238) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/15/0x280b12a70b48dcccfc263d6ef62e311b50169bdd.sol#236)

XulCrowdsale.mintToken (/unique_chucks/15/0x280b12a70b48dcccfc263d6ef62e311b50169bdd.sol#326-330) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-xultoken.mint(_to,_amount * (10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/15/0x280b12a70b48dcccfc263d6ef62e311b50169bdd.sol#330)

XulCrowdsale.superMint (/unique_chucks/15/0x280b12a70b48dcccfc263d6ef62e311b50169bdd.sol#339-345) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-xultoken.superMint(_to,_amount * (10 ** 18)) (/unique_chucks/15/0x280b12a70b48dcccfc263d6ef62e311b50169bdd.sol#344)
